entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
